Package com.patienttriage.service.impl

Class AppointmentServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.patienttriage.service.impl.AppointmentServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentService
@Service public class AppointmentServiceImpl extends Object implements AppointmentService
Implementation of AppointmentService for appointment management operations.

    • createAppointment

      @Transactional public AppointmentResponse createAppointment(AppointmentRequest request, UserRole role, Long currentUserId)
      Creates a new appointment.
      Specified by:
      createAppointment in interface AppointmentService
      Parameters:
      request - the appointment request containing patientId, doctorId, appointmentTime, and reason
      role - the role of the user making the request (ADMIN, DOCTOR, PATIENT)
      currentUserId - the ID of the user making the request
      Returns:
      AppointmentResponse with role-appropriate information
